profile.name: Cyrus Paulson
profile.title: Controls Engineer
profile.headline: Control Systems Engineer - GE Mark VIe · CIMPLICITY HMI/SCADA · Gas Turbine
profile.summary: I am a Controls Engineer with expertise in GE Gas Turbine Controls (Mark VIe, ToolboxST) and CIMPLICITY HMI/SCADA. I have worked on multiple turbine frames (7FA.05, 6F.03, 9F, HA) including SEC projects in Saudi Arabia. Skilled in commissioning, troubleshooting, and automation tooling, I deliver solutions that improve reliability, reduce operator intervention, and accelerate project schedules.

highlights: Improved start-up reliability by 15% via Mark VIe logic changes.
Reduced operator intervention by 25% with CIMPLICITY alarms/displays.
Saved ~8 hrs/week with PowerShell/Excel validation tooling.
AHK/VBA utilities reduced manual plant reporting steps by ~60%.
Prototyped ESP32-based logger (MQTT) for test rigs.

projects.name: HMI Alarm Rationalization
projects.blurb: Reduced alarm floods by grouping and prioritizing events; improved operator response time.

projects.name: Mark VIe Logic Tuning
projects.blurb: Reviewed permissives and interlocks; cut nuisance trips and improved startup reliability.

projects.name: Maintenance Toolkit
projects.blurb: Automated log parsing and report generation; standardized handover documents.
